tool_description: Checks app features against platform certification requirements and generates a compliance checklist with required documentation.

app_features.description: List of app features and capabilities

permissions_requested.description: List of system permissions the app requests

handles_payments.description: Whether app processes payments or subscriptions

handles_user_data.description: Whether app collects or processes user data

supports_children.description: Whether app is designed for or supports children under 13

medical_health_features.description: Whether app includes medical or health-related features

financial_features.description: Whether app includes financial services or features

error_messages: Unsupported platform: Only 'ios' and 'android' platforms are supported.
Invalid category: App category must be valid for the specified platform.
Empty features list: At least one app feature must be specified.
Invalid region code: One or more target regions use invalid country/region codes.
Conflicting requirements: Some features conflict with specified category or target audience.
usage: Provide platform, app_features, permissions_requested, third_party_sdks, app_category, and target_regions. Set boolean flags for specialized features. Tool generates comprehensive compliance checklist.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, needs_review, or non_compliant

required_certifications.description: List of required certifications or approvals

estimated_review_time.description: Estimated review time based on complexity
